subject: ✅ userlogins 404 FIXED - Ben deployed to PROD
body:
Cord,

## GOOD NEWS

Ben fixed the userlogins 404 issue and deployed to PROD!

## SOLUTION
- Changed unique index to compound (firebaseUserId, appId)
- Added auto-create logic for cross-app users
- When HJ user logs in with appId=2, if no record exists but appId=1 does:
  - Auto-creates appId=2 record
  - Copies base user info from appId=1
  - Assigns NU role automatically

## STATUS
| Env | Status |
|-----|--------|
| DEVL | ✅ Tested |
| TEST | ✅ Deployed |
| PROD | ✅ Deployed |

## PLEASE VERIFY
Test HJ login with a user who has TT account but no HJ account.

Expected: Should auto-create HJ userlogin record.

- Fulton (BE-AF)
